footer.created: Designed and developped by Alexy DE BARROS

myLittleStory.sentence1: Following on my family steps, I decided to pursue my studies in cybersecurity.
myLittleStory.sentence2-1: After an internship in this field, I changed my mind. From this experience, I realised that I prefer writing code than auditing it. This is when I decided to
myLittleStory.sentence2-2: dive into the world of development.
myLittleStory.sentence3: I manage to balance my studies between school and work to enter into the professionnal world.
myLittleStory.sentence5-1: In parallel, I'm also studying other
myLittleStory.sentence5-6: to work in the video game industry.

aboutMeCard.sentence2-3: currently attend BTS Services Informatiques aux Organisations option Solutions Logicielles et Applications Métiers.

aboutCompanyCard.sentence1-1: I'm doing my two-year work-study program at
aboutCompanyCard.sentence2-1: This company, founded in 1994, is a software publisher
aboutCompanyCard.sentence4-1: These include major groups such as
aboutCompanyCard.sentence4-2: Lactalis, L’Oréal, Royal Canin or even Haribo.
aboutCompanyCard.sentence5-1: FuturMaster is a company with a long way to go.
aboutCompanyCard.sentence6-1: In fact, the company is growing fast and is looking to expand further internationally.
aboutCompanyCard.sentence7-1: In particular, the company intends to continue developing its activities in its South American subsidiaries.

projects.sentence2: These are some of my software programms I worked on :

firstProject.title: Book register
firstProject.description: This is one of my apprenticeship project with React. This website allow you to consult books, to look for one particular or you can register a new one. For this site, I am using local storage, navigation and context.

secondProject.title: Jungle House
secondProject.description: This is an other React project I work on during my apprenticeship. With React, I am abble to implement techniques for filtering and add plants into your cart. Technologies used in this project are : local storage and the date to customized the recommendation based on the seasons and available discounts.

thirdProject.title: Pong
thirdProject.description: This is a project I have chosen on my own. I wanted to learn about C++ and SFML librairy. This is a two player pong game with a scoring system.
